short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Name Grades extension provides a simple method for scoring the commonality of a given name based on birth year and gender

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Name Grades is the solution for Consumer Reporting Agency common name procedures. Name Grades uses a proprietary algorithm to source through decades of registered names in an effort to weigh how common any given name is. This allows the CRA to establish a standardized, empirical policy to treat common names with a greater standard of care to ensure maximum possible accuracy.
